name: Pico's School Reunion
summary:
4月30日，Pico被邀请到学校参加聚会，
聚会散发着一股诡异的气氛，好像有什么秘密深藏其中，来揭开它吧。

It's April 30th, and Pico is randomly invited back to his old school to be the guest of honor. What mystery and intrigue lies waiting for him? Will him and his friends ever get out? Alive? Find out all this and more in Episode 1 of Pico's School Reunion.
info:
• 别名: 诡异的学校聚会
  • 平台: Web
  • 游戏类型: Adventure - Point 'n Click
